message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 400k, it's a good starting point, but I'm not giving up too much yet!
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
I'm not budging much, but I'll give you a bit more. Don't expect me to go any lower!
I'm getting closer to my target, but I'm still willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle!
I'm not giving up much more. Take it or leave it!
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still willing to make a deal. Let's meet in the middle again!
I'm not going to give up more than 10% of the total. Take it or leave it!
I'm getting down to the wire, but I'm still willing to make a deal. Let's try to find some common ground!
I'm not budging anymore. Take the last 2% or nothing!
I'm willing to take the risk and give you the whole pie. Take it and leave me with nothing.
You've had your chance, Alice. I'm taking it all!
